title: Children Center: Newsletter / Boletín #10
description: January 29th, 2021 / 29 de enero de 2021 Newsletter / Boletín # 10 January 29th, 2021 / 29 de enero de 2021 Dear Parents, With the start of the new year, I am happy to share with you several resource
cleaned_text: We plan to have regular monthly parent meetings. Some will be special presentations by our school therapist from CALM, while others will be regular parent/teacher meetings. The first meeting will be on February 3rd, 2021 from 5:00-6:00pm via Zoom. The meetings will occur on the first Wednesday of each month, and there will be English/Spanish interpretation. Please take a minute to provide your input on what topics you would be interested in learning more about.
